body: Something like this. If you look at the ptsVectors output from HB Gen Test Points component, your analysis vectors/direction are looking downward, which should not be the case when you want to study daylight ON the floor, meaning the vectors should be pointing up.     [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/YduLzJ9K5AysTtSTJK69x*iSsUx6elOqPf28Mqik91TPDOwNBmsb--OnZFy*3hkzFtsctlsN8C8*LVQVUFegoiWfTnFXm2sR/Unbenannt.PNG)
